lines: > Focus: Networks & Security, Mobile Apps, AI/ML

projects.title: Firmware Analyzer Tool
projects.description: Firmware analysis tool built with Python and Docker for scalability. Designed to parse, extract, and analyze firmware images with containerized workflows.

projects.title: Domain Checker - Production Ready Security Tool
projects.description: Comprehensive domain security analysis tool that helps identify potentially suspicious or fraudulent websites. Features advanced security checks, caching, and a modern user interface.

projects.title: Cybersecurity Labs & Scripts
projects.description: Educational scripts and completed labs from PortSwigger Academy, HackTheBox, and CTFs. Includes custom security automation scripts and write-ups.
